WorkItem.Description:
For this problem already exist an active item 1186
Sorry, I have previously not found.

https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1186

umlauts in string-literals or comments doesn't work with the new release

var test1: string = "o - it works"; 
var test2: string = "öüä - umlauts doesnt work!";   // compiler error - see below

/*
Compile Error. 
See error list for details
 error TS5004: Could not find file: 'test.ts'.
*/

Comments.Message: I just encountered it. To use them at least in literals, I used the String.fromCharCode function.
